title: Valuable Land at Piliyandala
details:
Land for sale close proximity to Piliyandala town, peaceful residential area, calm & quiet neighborhood.
Clear Deed

Highly developing residential area.
10 mint to Piliyandala
10 mint to katubadda/ Moratuwa
Easy access to Southern Express Way, Airport Express Way via Kahathuduwa Interchange.
3-Phase Electricity, Clear Title, Concrete Drains, Easy Payment Schemes, Electricity, Facing to Main Road, Main Access Road, Pipe Born Water, Private Roadway, Wide Tar Roads
Price Conditions: 375,000 pp - 395,000 pp
only 2 blocks
